title: PERSEVERE
itunes:title: PERSEVERE
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
PERSEVERE! When life gets hard, keep going! Get back up and PERSEVERE! You were created to do great things!


Best Motivational Video Speeches Compilation featuring new motivational videos by Motiversity and some of the best inspirational speeches ever featuring Coach Pain (https://bit.ly/CoachPainMotiversity), Marcus Taylor (https://bit.ly/MarcusTaylorMotiversity), Walter Bond (https://bit.ly/WalterBondMotiversity), Ronald A. Burgess Jr. (https://bit.ly/RonaldABurgessJrMotiversity), and Jessica Houston (https://bit.ly/DrJessicaHoustonMotiversity).


Music by Secession Studios (https://bit.ly/SecessionStudiosYouTube), Really Slow Motion (https://bit.ly/RSMMusic), Audiojungle (https://audiojungle.net/), Scott Buckley (https://www.youtube.com/c/ScottBuckley), and Whitesand (https://www.youtube.com/c/WhitesandComposer).






Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
